title.rendered: Richard Krempulec discusses his mediation style

content.rendered: Richard is a mediator and arbitrator with over 10 years experience. He has mediated a wide range of disputes including claims arising out of the performance of services, supplying products, personal and professional negligence, compensation for damages, insurance coverage, dealership obligations, and motor vehicle accidents. View his bio here.
